channel.title: NPC amy_webb made for the project
channel.description:
well i give myself probably bout 1% credit for making the basis of the model (it looked crappy :D) and 99% to her for making it look 100x better!
this is just one of the several new npc's that will be added into the project.
[img]http://i.tinyuploads.com/QI3cmP.png[/img]

hmm yea maybe so thats a good idea but we would make our own version of the claws and make them look xbillion better right? all about uniqueness

item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

kirikugi:

i could see you "meta"morphisizing this into a brute. a muscular variation of this npc with like spikes and tad more armor in places. if my laptop was working i could do it for you within a half hour but its pooped atm hence why i havnt made any new models for a while

hm. thanks i might use this idea i’ll have to keep it in mind

Read full topic

item.title: NPC amy_webb made for the project
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

Soulcist:

Yeah, I like the NPC and what are the plans for it?

um this one not so sure yet but we have lotssss of plans for stuff, i may use this as a new boss.

heres what i posted on a different post to someone who didnt know about the project maybe this will help

called "A Little Piece of Heaven" amy_webb and poopler and a few other people are joined in on it. we are taking all the armours and most npc's such as bosses out of game except for basic stuff such as bronze-rune and replacing with our own. we are adding a bunch of other features to. unqiue quest and areas. city clans, slave system, and much more.

site is alpoh.tk (.tk until we feel we really need an actual domain.)

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,627069.0.html thats development page ima redo it though its slack.

Read full topic
